snippet: About 45 civilians were killed in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, and Congolese troops killed four of the Rwandan rebels thought to have been responsible, the Congolese Army said.
abstract: Congolese troops kill four of the Rwandan rebels thought to have been responsible for the massacre of about 45 civilians that took place in several remote villages in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo.
lead_paragraph: About 45 civilians were killed in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, and Congolese troops killed four of the Rwandan rebels thought to have been responsible, the Congolese Army said.

headline.main: Congo: 45 Civilians Killed in South Kivu
headline.print_headline: Congo: 45 Civilians Killed in South Kivu
